messages.message:
Hey team,
I’ve been trying to start a sandbox and have attempted it three times so far. I tried restarting, refreshing with the base image, and even spinning up a new sandbox from master, but it usually fails during the `Build:_Instabase_` step in the build and keeps retrying that step.

This is the only consistent error I’m seeing in the logs, and I’m not sure if there’s another underlying issue preventing the sandbox from starting. I also tried restarting MySQL, but that didn’t help.

Does anyone have any suggestions on how to fix this?

sandbox2 (https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/abhishekadupa2?cw=dev). sandbox1 (https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/abhishekadupa1)
```ERROR - COPY - Request /repo_service.RepoService/GetMktplaceAvailSolns failed. Error code=UNKNOWN, Error=(2, 'unknown'), Message: Error 1049 (42000): Unknown database 'ibdb'. Non-retriable error
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/instabase-mktplace-update/py/publish_solutions.py", line 233, in <module>
    run()
  File "/instabase-mktplace-update/py/publish_solutions.py", line 133, in run
    solution_list, next_page_info, err = solution.list_avail_solns(
  File "/instabase-mktplace-update/py/instabase/tracing/utils.py", line 326, in wrapped
    raise error
  File "/instabase-mktplace-update/py/instabase/tracing/utils.py", line 321, in wrapped
    r = func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/instabase-mktplace-update/py/instabase/solution_utils/solution.py", line 270, in list_avail_solns
    if resp.status.code != repo_service_pb2.OK:
AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'status'
Sending termination signal to Envoy.
No Envoy processes were found to terminate.
Main application failed with status 1. ```
